sentences.english: I'm not going to overenjoy it just because it might be my last.
sentences.chinese: 我不会因为这是最后一个赛季就怡然自得。

sentences.english: One needs space to be oneself.
sentences.chinese: 人要有空间才能怡然自得。

sentences.english: Once he had enjoyed being alone.
sentences.chinese: 他有过怡然自乐的时候。

sentences.english: Edwin Yang, Grade 3 student, creates his photo story about his pet.
sentences.chinese: 三年级的杨怡然为他的宠物制作了短片。

sentences.english: She also delectated herself greatly in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 她一人在花园里也很怡然自得。

sentences.english: She always seemed so poised, so self-possessed.
sentences.chinese: 而她看上去总是那样神情自若而又怡然。

sentences.english: Yet Mr Roh was also ill at ease with himself.
sentences.chinese: 而且卢武铉自己真的也不太怡然自得。

sentences.english: His mood of contentment was beginning to lapse.
sentences.chinese: 他怡然自得的心情渐渐消失了。

sentences.english: Cattle, sheep and horses graze leisurely.
sentences.chinese: 牛羊骏马在这里怡然自得。

sentences.english: She will close the eyes comfortably, cozily.
sentences.chinese: 她会很舒服的闭上眼睛，怡然自得。

definition: quiet and contented/indifferent to fame or gain
bear hardship with equanimity/regard wrongdoing with equanimity
